name: PVZ Fangame Demo
description:
There are 6 levels to play in this demo. Your computer must be decently fast to play this game, and the Opera GX browser is HEAVILY recommended (although Google Chrome runs decently, while FireFox runs the slowest.)

This game has been in development for 3 months so far, and now it is in an actually sharable state! Do remember that the full game still isn't anywhere near completion.

Link to Scratch game: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/690378513/

(Scratch account) Flint-L for "point towards" script
(Scratch account) Xx_Yeet_Master_xX for LilyPad design (not added yet)
minermaster552 for Zombie Trap and Flora Throwa (not added yet) plants
Laura Shigihara for some music tracks
George Fan for PVZ
